On the other hand, some are hesitant to smile due to their teeth condition ‚Äî crooked teeth or teeth gap. If you're one of those whose teeth are crooked or have gaps, OrthoSmile‚Ñ¢ Teeth Corrector Brace can give you the courage to smile again!

3 STRENGTHS: This dental orthotic device comes with three levels of strength, which you can choose from depending on what you need.

First stage (D1): Soft. Mainly used to adapt to the orthotics and initial correction.

Second stage (D2): Moderate. Used to further adapt to orthotics and to enhance remedial effects.

Third stage (D3): Hard. Used to increase the correction force for post-correction and maintenance.

UNIVERSAL SHAPE: OrthoSmile‚Ñ¢ can be worn by people with different dental deformities.

ALIGNED TEETH: This dental orthotic device is made of strong yet flexible material and is designed to apply pressure on your teeth, it can close the gaps and align your teeth.

BETTER LOOKING FACE: Unlike the regular ortho dental braces that only align the teeth, this dental orthotic device results in better facial structure ‚Äî defined cheekbones and jawlines ‚Äî as it puts even pressure throughout the whole jaw.

MEWING TECHNIQUE: By using OrthoSmile‚Ñ¢, you can learn the mewing technique, wherein you unconsciously hold your tongue at the roof of your mouth with your lips closed. This technique, where you breathe through your nose, can help you have the proper tongue posture.

EFFECTIVE ORTHODONTIC DEVICE: Combined with human study, this orthodontic device is proven effective in correcting upper and lower crooked and crowded teeth, closing teeth gaps, and defining the jawline and facial muscles.

Training Methods:

  • This dental orthotic device must be worn while you sleep.
  • Wearing it all night can be more effective. If you can't wear it at night, be reminded to increase the usage time during the day.
  • Please keep your mouth close while the device is in your mouth.
  • Remember to place the tip of your tongue on the tongue plate, even if you're not wearing the brace.
  • You can see improvement of the detention within a few days after wearing it.

How to Use:

Step 1: Wear the orthotic device all night and 1-4 hours during the day. *You can wear it when you study, read, watch TV, use the computer, or work.
Step 2: Wash and store in the matching box after use.

Usage Instruction:

D1: Use for 1-3 months.
D2: Use for 5-8 months.
D3: Use for 5-8 months.

Reminder:

  • For first time use, it is normal that your front teeth will feel uncomfortable.
  • If there is obvious pain, you may reduce the time of wear of the orthotics, and return to the prescribed time once the sensitivity disappears.

entry.summary:

Product Description:

Having a double chin is often associated with weight gain, but a person doesn't have to be obese to have one. It may also be genetics and a result of aging. If you're one of those who struggle with having a double chin, there's an excellent face slimming device that could actually solve your problem ‚Äî DelicateSkin‚Ñ¢ Portable Chin Neckline Massager!

This revolutionary device designed to eliminate a double chin, thus helping you achieve the face shape you desire. It features three different strength springs (low, medium, and high) that produce different massage effect. From beginner to advanced toning, for rapid results.

Aside from double chin, DelicateSkin‚Ñ¢ Portable Chin Neckline Massager is also effective in firming your neck and cheeks ‚Äî without going under the knife or taking pills.

This facial beauty tool is not only suitable for women but also perfect for men who deal with a double chin.¬†

  • Mini and stylish appearance
  • Convenient to carry
  • Gives dramatic results in just 2 minutes a day
  • Ideal beauty facial tool

How to Use:

GIF

Step 1: Hold the device in your dominant hand.

Step 2: Place the bottom of the facial massager against your chest up to your collarbone.

Step 3: Rest the area behind your chin onto the gray padding of the pump.

Step 4: Bring your head down, like you're nodding. Do it slowly while holding the device in place.¬†

Step 5: Bring your chin down to press the pump down into the facial massager.

Step 6: Press down slowly and firmly as you feel some resistance, focusing on your neck muscles.

*Repeat this process for two minutes a day, 15 to 20 times a minute.

How to install spring?

GIF

Step 1: Choose the spring that as per your requirement (pink: low, green: medium, or purple: high).

Step 2: Unlock the chin pad by twisting the gold locking ring in a counter-clockwise position. The chin pad will pop up, keep twisting the gold ring until it "clicks" into the unlocked position.

Step 3: Once it is unlocked, you can insert the spring.

Step 4: To lock the chin pad in the down position, depress the chin pad fully and twist the gold locking ring in a clockwise direction until it "clicks" into the locked position.¬†

Image

entry.title: DazzlingSmile‚Ñ¢ Teeth Whitening Dental Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 17.99 - 26.99 (3 variants)

Product Description:

Don't you wish you had whiter teeth so you can smile more?

Yellowish and stained teeth can make us lose our confidence. It can even affect our interaction with other people!

No one wants to lose their self-confidence, that's why DazzlingSmile‚Ñ¢ Teeth Whitening Dental Kit is here to solve all your worries!

DazzlingSmile‚Ñ¢ Teeth Whitening Dental Kit can improve your teeth of up to 7 to 10 shades within 3 days!

It comes with laser light and 44% carbamide peroxide gel, a concentration approved as safe and effective teeth whitening by authorities, syringes for professional teeth whitening effect!

Even your teeth are damaged due to tobacco, wine or aging stains, rest assured that there is no bigger dilemma that this whitening equipment can't solve even hard to remove tetracycline teeth!

  • Rapid whitening effects
  • Professional finish treatment
  • Suitable for teeth damaged by coffee, sauce, cigarettes and even genetic yellow teeth
  • Can whiten even black teeth caused by unknown reason

How to Use:

¬†

DazzlingSmile‚Ñ¢ Teeth Whitening Dental Kit professional white teeth right at the comfort of your home!

Mouth Tray Moulding

Step 1: Boil the water and set aside it for 6-7 minutes.

Step 2: Put the mouth tray on the hot water for 10-12 seconds or until the tray softens.

Step 3: Place the mouth tray in your mouth covering your upper teeth then close your mouth.

Step 4: Mold the tray by pressing your upper lips against your teeth

Step 5: Wait for 10 to 15 seconds before removing the mouth tray.

Step 6: After removing the tray, place it in cold water for 10 seconds to retain the shape of your teeth on the tray.

Mouth Tray Trimming

After molding, get a scissor and trim any excess plastic from the open end of the tray.

It is important to remove excess plastic. It could possibly avoid gum irritation caused by mouth tray friction rubbing on your mouth.

Teeth Whitening

Step 1: Place a small drop of gel on each tray.

Step 2: Put the tray on your mouth. Make sure to put it properly covering and fitting all your teeth.

Step 3: Place the portable laser light on your mouth for 10 minutes.

Step 4: Remove the laser and the tray from your mouth and use the scaling measure to see the glowing transformation of your teeth!

Ingredient: 44% Carbamide Peroxide Gel

Weight: 35g

entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 29.99

Feature:

Pretty¬†Chic (011)¬†- Soft and light-colored lashes feel almost like you're born with it! Suitable for daily activities.

Modest Chic (012) - Gives your natural lashes a darker look but still keeps it minimalist. Suitable for dates or meetings.

Confident Glow (015)¬†- The celebratory lashes for women who love to keep it always fun!¬†Confident Glow is a dark color lash looks thick but light to the eyes and comes with natural space to keep your eyes look fuller but still almost natural! Suitable for midnight gala or parties.

Product Description:

¬†

Having long, thick, and curly lashes can undoubtedly enhance the eyes, as well as your look, however, not all are blessed with beautiful lashes. This is why some resort to getting eyelash extension, and some even paired it with having an eyeliner embroidery. But not everyone could afford or simply are hesitant about these beauty trends, hence there are alternatives like putting false eyelashes on and temporary eyeliner. Setting aside the benefits that these options can give are the downsides, such as the hassle that comes with using normal false eyelashes and eyeliner, plus it can be time-consuming, especially for those who aren't used to these. Thanks there is BloomVenus‚Ñ¢ Magnetic Eyelash & Eyeliner Kit!


This magnetic eyelash & eyeliner kit is 100% handmade and uses high-grade A fiber material, which ensures ultra-soft and long lash strands. Also, the product contains no animal hair nor tested on animals, hence vegan and 100% cruelty-free.¬†

¬†

Given it's super comfortable and lightweight, BloomVenus‚Ñ¢ Magnetic Eyelashes & Eyeliner Kit can be easily adjusted and worn all day long. Plus, it can make you feel like you're not wearing falsies at all.

Unlike the usual fake eyelashes which use glue, this magnetic eyelash & eyeliner kit does not, thus suitable for those who have sensitive skin and glue allergy.

  • Makes your eyes dazzle
  • Comes with different eyelash styles
  • Blends in perfectly; making it look like natural eyelashes
  • Easy to apply; no special skills or makeup experience needed
  • Contains no animal hair ‚Äî vegan and 100% cruelty-free
  • Safe to use; won't cause any irritation to the eyes
  • Super convenient; easy to bring everywhere
  • The kit comes with an eyelash holder; enables you to easily adjust your eyelashes

The magnetic eyeliner features a 1mm tip that enables you to draw a precise line on top of your lashes with just a single stroke.

With five thin magnets, you can quickly and easily put on the magnetic lashes without feeling irritated.

How to Use:

Step 1: Apply BloomVenus Magnetic Eyeliner above your lash line like you normally would. (If you're using eyeshadow, apply it before the eyeliner.)
Step 2: Add a second coat of eyeliner.
Step 3: Wait until the Magnetic Eyeliner is totally dry. The liner must be dry in order to attach the magnetic lashes.
Step 4: Gently place the magnetic lashes on your lash line.
Step 5: Once you're satisfied with the placement, gently press the lash down to set it properly.Ôªø

How to Remove

Step 1: Gently pull the magnetic eyelashes off.
Step 2: Remove the remaining makeup residue from magnets using oil-based makeup remover.¬†Do not wash the lashes in order to not damage the lash strips.
Step 3: Properly store the lashes in carrying case for future use.

Specifications:

Material: Chemical Fiber
Type: Magnetic Eyelash & Eyeliner
False Eyelashes Length: 1cm - 1.5cm
Product Size: 13.3*11.7*2.8cm [box]
Color: Black

Include:

1 x Magnetic Liquid Eyeliner

3 x Pairs Magnetic Eyelashes

1 x Eyelash Holder (tweezers)

Note:

  • Please be advised that magnetic eyelashes can only be worn once the eyeliner is completely dry.
  • Store the magnetic eyelashes when not in use.
